select
distinct
from ACTACT
order by ${orderByClause}

mapper.update:
update ACTACT
SYSIDT = #{record.sysidt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORGIDT = #{record.orgidt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUSIDT = #{record.cusidt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APCODE = #{record.apcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CURCDE = #{record.curcde,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTNAM = #{record.actnam,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BOKBAL = #{record.bokbal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AVABAL = #{record.avabal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DIFBAL = #{record.difbal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CIFBAL = #{record.cifbal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MAVBAL = #{record.mavbal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
YAVBAL = #{record.yavbal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DDRAMT = #{record.ddramt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DCRAMT = #{record.dcramt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DDRCNT = #{record.ddrcnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DCRCNT = #{record.dcrcnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MDRAMT = #{record.mdramt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MCRAMT = #{record.mcramt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MDRCNT = #{record.mdrcnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MCRCNT = #{record.mcrcnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
YDRAMT = #{record.ydramt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
YCRAMT = #{record.ycramt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
YDRCNT = #{record.ydrcnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
YCRCNT = #{record.ycrcnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DINRAT = #{record.dinrat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CINRAT = #{record.cinrat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DRATSF = #{record.dratsf,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CRATSF = #{record.cratsf,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DACINT = #{record.dacint,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CACINT = #{record.cacint,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DAMINT = #{record.damint,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CAMINT = #{record.camint,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
INTFLG = #{record.intflg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INTCYC = #{record.intcyc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INTTRA = #{record.inttra,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LINTDT = #{record.lintdt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ACTTYP = #{record.acttyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTGLC = #{record.actglc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTPLC = #{record.actplc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPNUM = #{record.depnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LENTDT = #{record.lentdt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LINDTH = #{record.lindth,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DRACCM = #{record.draccm,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CRACCM = #{record.craccm,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CQEFLG = #{record.cqeflg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BALLIM = #{record.ballim,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OVELIM = #{record.ovelim,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OVEEXP = #{record.oveexp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
OPNDAT = #{record.opndat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CLSDAT = #{record.clsdat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REGSTS = #{record.regsts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FRZSTS = #{record.frzsts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTSTS = #{record.actsts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AMDTLR = #{record.amdtlr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDDAT = #{record.upddat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RECSTS = #{record.recsts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update ACTACT set SYSIDT = #{record.sysidt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORGIDT = #{record.orgidt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUSIDT = #{record.cusidt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APCODE = #{record.apcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CURCDE = #{record.curcde,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACTNAM = #{record.actnam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BOKBAL = #{record.bokbal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AVABAL = #{record.avabal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DIFBAL = #{record.difbal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CIFBAL = #{record.cifbal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MAVBAL = #{record.mavbal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, YAVBAL = #{record.yavbal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DDRAMT = #{record.ddramt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DCRAMT = #{record.dcramt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DDRCNT = #{record.ddrcnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DCRCNT = #{record.dcrcnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MDRAMT = #{record.mdramt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MCRAMT = #{record.mcramt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MDRCNT = #{record.mdrcnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MCRCNT = #{record.mcrcnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, YDRAMT = #{record.ydramt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, YCRAMT = #{record.ycramt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, YDRCNT = #{record.ydrcnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, YCRCNT = #{record.ycrcnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DINRAT = #{record.dinrat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CINRAT = #{record.cinrat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DRATSF = #{record.dratsf,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CRATSF = #{record.cratsf,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DACINT = #{record.dacint,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CACINT = #{record.cacint,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DAMINT = #{record.damint,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CAMINT = #{record.camint,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, INTFLG = #{record.intflg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INTCYC = #{record.intcyc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INTTRA = #{record.inttra,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LINTDT = #{record.lintdt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ACTTYP = #{record.acttyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACTGLC = #{record.actglc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACTPLC = #{record.actplc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPNUM = #{record.depnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LENTDT = #{record.lentdt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LINDTH = #{record.lindth,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DRACCM = #{record.draccm,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CRACCM = #{record.craccm,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CQEFLG = #{record.cqeflg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BALLIM = #{record.ballim,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OVELIM = #{record.ovelim,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OVEEXP = #{record.oveexp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OPNDAT = #{record.opndat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CLSDAT = #{record.clsdat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REGSTS = #{record.regsts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRZSTS = #{record.frzsts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACTSTS = #{record.actsts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AMDTLR = #{record.amdtlr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDDAT = #{record.upddat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RECSTS = #{record.recsts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ani.oldacn,act.actnam,act.bokbal,act.lentdt,act.ddramt,act.dcramt from actact act join actani ani on act.sysidt=ani.sysidt and act.orgidt=ani.orgidt and act.cusidt=ani.cusidt and act.apcode=ani.apcode and act.curcde=ani.curcde join actapc apc on ani.apcode=apc.apcode where act.orgidt=#{orgidt} and act.sysidt='8' and act.curcde=#{curcde} and apc.apcode=#{apcode} order by ani.oldacn

select act.curcde,sum(act.bokbal) bokbal, (select ccy.curnmc from actccy ccy where ccy.curcde=act.curcde) as curnmc from actact act where act.orgidt=#{orgidt} and act.sysidt='8' group by act.curcde order by act.curcde

select apc.glcode,sum(act.bokbal) bokbal, (select t.glcnam from actglc t where t.glcode=apc.glcode) as glcnam from actact act join actapc apc on act.apcode=apc.apcode
where act.orgidt=#{orgidt} and act.sysidt='8' and act.curcde=#{curcde} group by apc.glcode order by apc.glcode

select act.apcode,sum(act.bokbal) bokbal, apc.apcnam from actact act join actapc apc on act.apcode=apc.apcode where act.orgidt=#{orgidt} and act.sysidt='8' and act.curcde=#{curcde} and apc.glcode=#{glcode} group by act.apcode,apc.apcnam order by act.apcode

SELECT ACTPLC.PLCTYP, ACTACT.ACTGLC, ACTACT.ACTPLC, SUM(ACTACT.BOKBAL) TOTALBOKBAL, ACTPLC.PLCNAM FROM ACTACT, ACTPLC WHERE ACTACT.ORGIDT = '010' AND ACTACT.ACTGLC = ACTPLC.GLCODE AND ACTACT.ACTPLC = ACTPLC.PLCODE AND ACTACT.SYSIDT = '8' AND ACTPLC.RECSTS = ' ' AND ACTACT.RECSTS = ' ' AND ACTACT.CURCDE = #{curcde} AND ACTACT.ACTGLC = #{glcode} GROUP BY ACTPLC.PLCTYP, ACTACT.ACTGLC, ACTACT.ACTPLC, ACTPLC.PLCNAM ORDER BY ACTPLC.PLCTYP, ACTACT.ACTGLC, ACTACT.ACTPLC
